99937.「今から ヴェリナード領南の 海辺の交易所と\n ブーナー熱帯雨林の 密林の野営:
I'm going to the Beach Trading Post in Verinard South and the Jungle Camp in Booner Rainforest. Would you like to
join me?

99940.<pipipi_low>「うーん。すまねー。\n 今そこへ向かうのは\n ちっと:
Hmmm. I'm sorry. It's not a good time to head out there. I'll give you your money back. Just give me some time to
come back.

99941.「ただよー 送るだけで 迎えには行けねーぜ？\n それでもよけりゃ どこに行くよ:
But I can't just drop you off and pick
you up, can I? Where will you go if
you want?
<name_off><select>
Beach Trading Post (Verinard South)
Jungle Camp (Booner Rainforest)
No Ride
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

99942.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「まいどありー。:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Thank you very much. I'll see you
later!

99943.「そうかー。乗らねーかー。\n 乗りたくなったら また来るんだぜー。:
I see. I guess I won't ride. If you
want to ride, come back again.

99944.<pipipi_low>「おまちどー。\n 海辺の交易所に 着いたぜ！\n そん:
<pipipi_low>Hey there, guys! I'm at the Beach
Trading Post! See you soon!

99945.<pipipi_low>「おまちどー。\n 密林の野営地に 着いたぜ！\n そん:
<pipipi_low>Hey there, guys! I'm here at Jungle
Camp! See you soon!

99946.「あー。金が足りねーな。\n すまねーが 金のある時に\n また来てくれよー。:
Ah. I ain't got enough money. I'm
sorry, but please come back when you
have more money.

99947.「<%sL_TIMEI>まで\n だな。\n あと 代金２５ゴールドいただくぜ？:
<%sL_TIMEI>. And I'll take 25 gold for
that.<yesno><break>

99948.「そうかー。やめるのかー。\n 乗りたくなったら また来るんだぜー。:
I see. You're quitting? If you want to
ride again, come back.

124154.「おぅいえー 旅人さん。\n オレは 行商人エナギってんだ。\n よろしくどうぞ:
Hey there, traveler. My name is Peddler Enagi. Pleased to meet you! It's my job to carry the goods from
Verinard to the various places with this wagon! I'm going to the Beach Trading Post in Verinard South and the
Jungle Camp in Booner Rainforest. Won't you join me?

125637.「ここから南の ヴェリナード領南を 南下すると\n 海辺の交易所って 集落がある:
If you go south on Verinard South from here, you will find a settlement called Beach Trading Post. If you
follow this Verinard North road all the way to the east, you will reach the Jungle Camp at Booner Rainforest.
If you have never been there, you should go there at least once.
